titles.title: Joint Federal Task Force on Clandestine Drug Laboratories Establishment Act of 1988
A bill to establish the Joint Federal Task Force on Clandestine Drug Laboratories.

bill.summary: 6/15/1988--Introduced. Joint Federal Task Force on Clandestine Drug Laboratories Establishment Act of 1988 - Establishes the Joint Federal Task Force on Clandestine Drug Laboratories to formulate, establish, and implement a program for the cleanup and disposal of hazardous waste produced by clandestine drug laboratories. Directs the Task Force to submit an initial report to the President and the Congress and to report periodically on its progress thereafter.
